content: p4 turn k4 cast off 4 p19 k2tg k17 coast on 4 p22 k2tg k15 turn p16 k2tg k19 p4 turn k4 cast off 4 p16 k16 cast on 4 p4 turn k4 p20 increase k14 turn p16 increase k20 cast off 4 p18 increase k17 cast on 4 p4 turn k4 turn p4 turn k4 cast off 4 p19 cast off 7 k12 cast on 4 p4 turn k4 turn p4 turn k4 cast off 4 p12 k12 cast on 4 p4 turn k4 p16 cast on 7 k23 cast off 4 p19 cast off 2 p17 cast on 4 p4 turn k4 turn p4 turn k4 cast off 4 p17 cast on 2 k15 cast on 4 p4 turn k4 turn p4 turn k4 cast off 4 p15 k15 cast on 4 p4 turn k4 p19 cast off 19 with right side facing pick up and knit 8 sts at cast on edge of sleeve using wool and needles as at edge of skirt increase in each st 16 k 14 p picot cast off as before stomacher this is crocheted using the 1 75mm hook i used a scrap of multi-coloured 4 ply choose any 4 ply from your stash turn row with 1 chain which is not counted as a st 3ch 2 increase twice 4 4 increase 2 increase 4 row of 6 increase 4 increase 4 row of 8 increase 6 increase 4 row of 10 sew sleeves close to edge over-casting on right side with sts on safety-pin at a level with shoulder cast off of bodice set in sleeves neatly over-casting on right side turn in and sew in place a narrow hem up each front from waist to neck using cap wool and with right side facing pick up and knit 6 sts across right front k the 5 sts from safety-pin 11 sts across back 5 from safety-pin and 6 across left front cast off then on one side attach to stomacher so that the bodice overlaps it slightly and the top edges are aligned with the top of the bodice just below the contrast cast off use a running stitch near the fold of the bodice side hem put the bodice on the doll stitch the other side of the stomacher in place 15 shoes these are crocheted in 4 ply with a 1 75mm hook the abbreviation treble_crochet is for what brits know as a treble and americans a double_crochet i used bergere de france initial in gris clair for the soles and online linie 2 supersocke silk col 15 for uppers sole 4ch miss 1ch 3 turning with 1 chain which does not count as a st work 6 row of 3 sts decrease 1 last 2 sts decrease finish off this is the toe end toebox and tongue work 10 sts around toe 4 at sides 2 at end turn 1 row of 10 sts 1ch miss 3 sts 2tr in next 2 treble_crochet 2tr in
